Intensive Repair Shampoo For Damaged Hair

A deeply moisturizing shampoo that offers complete care for your locks and helps visibly repair damaged hair, with Dove Bio-Nourish Complex.
Fresh scent 

	Intensive Repair Shampoo and Conditioner to help repair hair damage
	Made with Dove Bio-Nourish Complex
	Shampoo for damaged hair that works in harmony with your hair
	Damaged hair system that stops 98% of daily hair damage*
	Use with Intensive Repair Conditioner to help protect hair from damage*
	This shampoo and conditioner system helps to repair hair damage*

*due to breakage vs. non-conditioning shampoo

Our hair goes through a lot, from changes in the weather to everyday heat styling. The secret to caring for damaged hair? Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo and Conditioner for damaged hair  specially made to target and revive damaged hair, restoring its healthy look and feel.

When used with the Dove Intense Repair Conditioner, this reviving shampoo gives you complete care that works in harmony with your hair. Made with Dove Bio-Nourish Complex, our reparative shampoo and conditioner for damaged hair work together to precisely target damaged hair on the surface and replenish it with a blend of protein, lipid and nutrients. After just one use, these clever hair repair products help to stop 98% of daily hair damage.*

*due to breakage vs. non-conditioning shampoo


Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sodium C12-13 Pareth Sulfate,
Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Gluconate, Fragrance (Parfum),
Dimethiconol, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin,
Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Guar
Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, PPG-9, TEADodecylbenzenesulfonate,
Cocamide MEA, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M,
Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Iodopropynyl
Butylcarbamate, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal,
Limonene, Linalool, Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

 Damaged hair
Made with Bio-Nourish Complex, the system helps to repair damaged hair by targeting and repairing recurring hair damage. When used with the conditioner, this system helps prevent up to 98% of daily hair damage*.

*due to breakage vs. non-conditioning shampoo

 Intense nourishment
When used together, our shampoo and conditioner for damaged hair target and visibly repair damage to restore your hairs healthy look and feel.  With Dove Bio-Nourish Complex,   the rich formulas nourish damaged hair to leave it looking shiny and silky smooth.

 A caring hair care routine
Developed to work in harmony with your hair, this reviving shampoo does more than just cleanse your hair. When used with the Intensive Repair Conditioner, this shampoo   helps you to repair hair damage at home.


Ready to wash your hair? Massage this shampoo for damaged hair into wet hair and rinse. For best results, use with Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner for healthy-looking hair.






For a caring hair care routine, a wide-toothed comb is your best friend when it comes to wet hair. Try to only use a brush when your hair is completely dry  it'll help to prevent hair damage.

2023 Good Housekeeping Award
Dove Intensive Repair is #1 for making hair more manageable and smoother! Add this Award-winning duo as the first step in your hair routine and stop 98% of daily hair damage* after just one use.*damage due to breakage, system vs. non-conditioning shampoo
